summary: Bruce Banner || Tickle Headcanons
title: Bruce Banner || Tickle Headcanons
body:
Requested by anon.

Lee:

  • Super embarrassed by how ticklish he is.
  • Can’t stand teasing in any capacity.
  • Blushes so hard when you point out how sensitive he is.
  • Starts to giggle before you even touch him.
  • Gets tickled a lot by Tony, especially when the other scientist gets bored.
  • Surprisingly doesn’t make him turn into the Hulk.
  • Has this frantic laugh whenever you get too close to a sweet spot.
  • Worst spots are his neck, ribs, and hips.

Ler:

  • Not much of a ler, in all honesty.
  • Mainly tickles Tony as revenge for attaching him.
  • Sometimes joins in on the team tickle fights.
  • Casual teaser.
  • “I’m not expert on the subject, but aren’t knees supposed to be ticklish?”
  • Uses only gentle tickles. 
  • Occasionally has playful tickle fights with Natasha.
  • Always loses.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: allfandomnerd
blog.title: ALLfandomNERD
blog.description:
AN EXCLUSIVE MULTI FANDOM BLOG. On the menu I have: a daily dose of INCORRECT QUOTES & posts for the MARVEL, AVENGERS, SHERLOCK, FIGURE SKATING, PERCY JACKSON, HEROES OF OLYMPUS, TRIALS OF APOLLO, KINGSMAN, THE HUNGER GAMES, TAYLOR SWIFT, GAME OF THRONES, NARNIA & X MEN FANDOM. Also HOT & SPICY (lol) posts regarding SOME OF THE BEST TEA SPILLING SHIPS including my OTP BUCKYNAT/ WINTERWIDOW, VIRTUEMOIR, CHERIK, PERCABETH, CALEO, SOLANGELO, CRESSIDALE & the-long-dead-but-still-alive-in-my-heart-ship CLATO. FOLLOW NOW TO GET A FREE DAILY DOSE OF FEELS, LAUGHTER & FUN.

Avatar- @giadin-a

summary:
“don’t do anything stupid until i get back”
“how can i? you’re taking all the stupid with you”
Just a reminder, this proves that...
body:
“don’t do anything stupid until i get back”

“how can i? you’re taking all the stupid with you”


Just a reminder, this proves that Buck is doing FANTASTICALLY in terms of rehabilitation.

If he remembers this moment well enough to reference it, what else does he remember?

*whispering* Natasha.. he remembers Natasha…

It is cannon

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Tony Stark : A hero
title: Tony Stark : A hero
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VWboTz

by Nuttelashake

“You were Peter …PETER…underoos …the kid, MY kid. You were just something that needed to stay. You were my everything. You weren’t supposed to leave. You were a part of the world’s explanation for me. There wasn’t supposed to be a world ..a world without you….and I just can’t …”
_________
Or
This is the next part of my series and it’s about how Tony feels after Peter’s death and what keeps him alive.

Words: 1729, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of The hero in all of us

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, (Actually just Tony )
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Dead Peter Parker, Peter Parker Dies, Not in This Fic, Emotional Hurt, Hurt No Comfort, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Sad Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Grief/Mourning, Basically A One Chapter Fic After Peter’s Death And How Tony Feels And Deals, I’m Making My Own Way In Tagging, I Can Teach It In Middle School


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VWboTz
